title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: 1) When a Java editor is open, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler does not trigger a popup menu to add breakpoints or marks. The expected popup menu is missing.
EB: 1) When a Java editor is open, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler should trigger a popup menu to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler to trigger the popup menu.
3) Confirm that the menu does not appear.
